name: Lamp Atoll
description: Created in 2008 by Christian Liaigre as part of the Motu Tan√© project in Bora Bora, the Atoll lamp is a bronze sculpture symbolizing the squaring of a circle. It evokes an annular coral reef of the warm seas, enclosing a lagoon communicating with the open sea. The most famous are those of the Maldives, Tuamotu, Kiribati, Bikini. This ring will bring a subtle halo of light to any interior space. Lamp in patina bronze.
